phrases: As ordered, I brought those two here.
Those Drifters appear to be two old men,
but they are in the midst of a heated fight.
Why the hell is this two-bit thief here?!
Who are you calling two-bit thief?!
You are the one who should be called that!
You stole it from me, idiot!
You copied my strategy from Cannae and used it in Zama, moron!
What are you talking about, you old fool?!
Why do not you show me you can win, then?!
Grrr, why are you talking like a chosen one, you idiot?!
I did not steal it, since I won the war fair and square!
That is why I hate the Romans!
When I go back, I will salt all of Carthage!
When I go back, I will cross the Alps one more time!
What would you like me to do, Grand Master?
The issue is that their intentions...
We must find out what they are somehow...
You two, I have told you so many times!
You guys went to that deserted castle again, did not you?
I have repeatedly told you not to get involved with Drifters!
I have warned you about entering the forest, going to that deserted castle,
If the lord and his men ever find out, they will kill you!
Stay away from them, got it?!
Is this the smell of battle?
There must be bandits or brigands.
They are the strange folks who live beyond the forest.
The ones with long ears who dragged you here.
I do not know where I am or what is going on!
I do not know if this is a dream or reality!
So, the only thing left for me is to charge forward!
He is the idiot, not me.
He was dying not long ago.
Is he a human bullet or something?
What are they going to do?
You are slow, too slow, Nobunaga!
What is wrong with you, Demon King of the Sixth Heaven?
I am already fifty, you idiot!
How old are you, Lord Toyohisa?
What is with that smug smile?!
This punk is completely different from the character in the
Are you the Drifters in the deserted castle?
I do not know what the hell you are talking about.
You two saved my life, did not you?
Are you okay with these two?
Why do not you tell them to die, too?
Way to force the conclusion you want.
I have just witnessed fast-talking on par with that of the Ikko sect.
They cannot be brigands or bandits...
It is like they are asking me to seize their land.
Instead of saying take back, or help them, he said, claim, right?
That is their nature, and it is innate and pathological.
It is their most powerful ability.
It is the only ability they have.
No matter when or where they live, they have only one governing principle.
What on earth is going on?
What are you accusing us of?
You entered the forest and saved a Drifter, did not you?
Entering the forest, making bows, and associating with Drifters...
These are all serious crimes for Elves.
In order to save a dying man, the children...
Is that the reason you are asking me to overlook this?
You Elves are really disgraceful and insolent.
The administration of Drifters is a job for magicians of the Octobrist Organization.
It is a serious crime for demihumans like you to get involved.
Did you think we did not notice?
First of all, you have been unreasonable!
We would not be able to get firewood or nuts without entering the forest!
You have forced us to work as serfs and have taken our women away from us.
Now, these children save a dying man and you call it a crime?!
Are you telling us Elves to die?!
If you want to curse at somebody,
put the blame on your ancestors who lost the war.
Someday, Elves, Dwarves, Hobbits, and all demihuman races will be extinct.
I am just culling your population.
I was told I am allowed to eliminate up to 50 of you.
You have to take care of yourself.
You have a future... as a pathetic serf.
As for your brothers who saved the Drifter, they are finished.
They are probably corpses by now.
They will become feed for the insects of the forest.
There is a fire in the wheat filed.
It is before the harvest time!
I will lose the tax money!
I have been telling you to keep an eye on it, have not I?!
You set fire to their field?
Those without dignity can survive if they have food to eat.
Those without food can endure their hunger as long as they have dignity.
But those who have lost both stop caring and desperately cling to anything.
That was the tactic the Ikko sect kept employing against me.
It is the best way to steal a country.
It reminds me of Ise Nagashima.
That is the head of the commander, huh?
What the hell is he saying?!
That scary-looking man saved our lives.
Drifter, are you interfering with me?
I do not want your head.
I do not know what on earth you are talking about.
You, a barbarian who cannot even speak!
Aram is not an ordinary soldier.
He is a real knight backed by the magistrate.
The Kumite style anti-armor technique with the sheath of a sword...
The enemies who were fleeing are no more.
That guy is scary, but so are you.
Well, what is he going to do now?
You must put an end to his life.
I do not know where we are or who you are,
but this is the revenge you must take.
This kid is telling you to avenge him!
They cannot understand his words, but they know what he is been telling them.
Do not you know the consequences...?!
You know I am still recuperating!
Well, we have been busy with other things.
Well, well, you must be tired.
I was going to sit down, but I will let you take my seat.
Shimazu Toyohisa Seizes Control of Elf Village?!
You are still wasting your time struggling, huh, Murasaki?
No matter how hard you try, no matter how many Drifters you send,
No matter how much effort you make, it is all futile.
I will not let you have your way.
If you think you can do it, go ahead and try!
There is no way your Drifters could possibly beat my Ends!
This is Semu, this is Semu!
Grand Master, they finally seized the village!
It is dangerous to let them run loose!
I will bring them there immediately!
There is no time for that.
Act 3 Army of Ours-Sortie at Dawn
